title: Jesus Christ Rito What is wrong with your server
body:
after i finish my game, i tried to play another game and when it comes to champ select, it suddenly disconnected from chat which I lost lp b/c of it. Please don't even try to say check your god damn network since it is perfectly fine and give my lp back.
now i can't even login, it authenticates forever

replies.body:
While we haven't had any widespread or major NA server issues today, this might still be somewhat related to your connection's strength. It's not entirely uncommon for someone's network to be able to contact Google just fine but have issues contacting other specific servers. 

If you're still having problems getting logged in or playing games, troubleshoot your current network settings to see if anything might be out of place by following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). I know you said your network is fine, but it's hard to know where the problem lies without doing some general troubleshooting first. Run through those steps, and let me know how it goes.
Same thing happened to me :(, Except I was in my promos for silver.
